SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT POST_NUM, POST_CATE_NUM, BLOGGER_ID, CASE WHEN LENGTH(POST_TITLE) <= '10' THEN POST_TITLE WHEN LENGTH(POST_TITLE) > '10' THEN SUBSTR(POST_TITLE, 0,10)||' ...' END AS POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_VIEW, POST_HEART, TO_CHAR(POST_DATE,'YYYY.mm.dd HH24:MI') AS POST_DATE, POST_TAG, THUMBNAIL FROM TB_BLOG_POST
ORDER BY POST_DATE DESC ) A ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT POST_NUM, POST_CATE_NUM, BLOGGER_ID, CASE WHEN LENGTH(POST_TITLE) <= '10' THEN POST_TITLE WHEN LENGTH(POST_TITLE) > '10' THEN SUBSTR(POST_TITLE, 0,10)||' ...' END AS POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_VIEW, POST_HEART, TO_CHAR(POST_DATE,'YYYY.mm.dd HH24:MI') AS POST_DATE, POST_TAG, THUMBNAIL FROM TB_BLOG_POST
AND POST_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-10 AND SYSDATE AND ROWNUM <= 12 ORDER BY POST_VIEW DESC, POST_HEART DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BLOG_POST
AND ( INSTR(POST_TITLE, #{searchWord}) > 0 OR INSTR(POST_CONTENT, #{searchWord}) > 0 OR INSTR(POST_TAG, #{searchWord}) > 0 OR INSTR(BLOGGER_ID, #{searchWord}) > 0 ) ORDER BY POST_DATE DESC
